content: My apologies for the confusion. To adjust the frequency, simply press the button on the back of the egg to switch between slow and speed mode. To increase the intensity of the pulses, twist the egg to your desired level. We recommend using the product for 15 minutes per session, and using it regularly for up to a week to see the full effects. You can use it in the morning, during the day, or before bed to relieve stress, improve focus, or help you relax and sleep better at night.
